lastSession.summary: Added optional LSP support to /analyze and /think commands. Simplified README and install scripts. Added cleanup of obsolete commands to installers.

shipped.summary: Add optional LSP support to /analyze and /think for more accurate code analysis
Simplify README and install script output
Install scripts now remove obsolete commands before copying
Add parallel subagent patterns for faster command execution
Make /fix and /push parse CI config first to match actual CI requirements
Add config creation for linting/analysis tools in /fix and /refactor
Rename /plan to /spec to avoid built-in command conflict
Enhance /push: CI status check + pre-push lint detection
Add /spec for spec-driven planning before complex tasks
Add /agent and /mcp commands for SDK project auditing
Add /fix (auto-fix linting, formatting, unused imports) and /test (run tests intelligently)
